name: Introspectus
description:
A point and click introspection. Descend into your inner self and experience some dream states. Complete the game to have an important revelation about yourself.

"…why should we not calmly and patiently review our own thoughts, and thoroughly examine and see what these appearances in us really are?" Plato (Theaetetus, 155)

The game it's free to play. Please enjoy.
If you like this project and want to play more, give me your support: www.patreon.com/squame
